product_name: Horny Toad Wynter Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The jersey knit face of the women's Horny Toad Wynter Jacket looks for all the world like a cozy sweater, but the underside is soft, low-pile fleece. Polyester fleece zip-front sweater is warm and durable. Raglan sleeves enhance fit, allowing freedom of movement. Full-front zipper is sewn with contrasting stitching. Horny Toad Wynter Jacket for women has a rounded back hem and angled front pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The jersey knit face of the women's Horny Toad Wynter Jacket looks for all the world like a cozy sweater, but the underside is soft, low-pile fleece.
